ComicInfo.Summary:
Zombie Tramp creator Dan Mendoza returns once again to write and draw a special full issue about the evil little undead adversary, MORNING - the red head of the dead! Dispatched to limbo by Zombie Tramp, Morning is now yanked back to the land of the living and none to happy about it!
Features a variant and risqu√© variant cover by series creator Dan Mendoza, regular artist TMChu, and Andrew Pepoy (Afterlife With Archie).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | Var | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | TMChu | 3 | Var | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | TMChu | 4 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Pepoy | 5 | Var | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Andrew Pepoy | 6 | Note: The digital edition (2/24/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
